name: Bomb Boy: Escape
description:
With absorbing gameplay, easy to learn controls, scaled difficulty levels, fun power ups and special equipment, you’ll love playing this puzzle adventure game over and over.

FEATURES
● Motion, aiming, and bombing
● Great humor, and tons of fun
● Intuitive gameplay and easy to use
● Unlock amazing flying characters
● Awesome sound effects and soundtrack
● Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
● HD Graphics

BLAST AWAY WITH YOUR FLYING MACHINE
● In Bomb Boy your aim is to survive as long as possible by blasting away layers of rising tower below you.
● Earn bonus coins by blasting multiple layers, and maintaining score streaks: coins can be spent on upgrading equipment.
● Easy to learn, challenging to progress, tough to master, tons of fun to play!

LOVE THE CONTROLS
● Bomb Boy’s interface and gameplay are totally intuitive, start playing immediately without long complicated tutorials.

ENJOY THE GRAPHICS
● Experience truly amazing graphics and design elements. Bright and fun screens with lots of hidden humor.
